page.title: 12RELIGIONS
page.content: As our school (Earley St.Peter's C.E. School) is a Church of England one it is not surprising that 74% of the children are of that religion. 14% of the children are Non-Conformist (Christians), 9% Roman Catholic and 3% are Islam, Sikh, Bahai or Jewish. Although the school is Church of England there are no problems between different sects. The disappointing discovery in this section is that only 28% of our children are regular church attenders! This 28% is made up mainly of the non- conformists and the Sikhs. 25% attend church on the "odd" weekend and 47% do not attend at all. Of that 47% a considerable number said they went if they had to with the school! Some said "Christmas only" and others said "If we are up in time".
